Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The adverse events during combined therapy with cyclosporin A and nifedipine included an increase in blood urea nitrogen levels in 9 of the 13 patients and development of gingival hyperplasia in 2 of the 13 patients .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| increase in blood urea nitrogen levels |
| development of gingival hyperplasia |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| increase in blood urea nitrogen levels |
| development of gingival hyperplasia |

These are the only entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to diseases. "An increase in blood urea nitrogen levels" is a condition that indicates kidney dysfunction, and "development of gingival hyperplasia" is a condition that affects the gums.
